title: _WDF_MEMORY_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE (wdfmemory.h)
description: The WDF_MEMORY_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE enumeration identifies the types of memory descriptions that a WDF_MEMORY_DESCRIPTOR structure can specify.
